name: Too Many Bullets (Gredu)
description:
Hello !

This is our submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020 !

Too Many Bullets is an arcade shoot'em up game with hella bullets.
-Play with your mouse and keyboard (WASD/ZQSD) PRESS R for quick restart
- Absorb yellow bullets with your shield to drop a bomb ! Don't shoot too much or it might get Out of Control

Graphics, Sound & Game Design :
-Nemael
-Jérémie "Gredu" Potaznik

Music by :
-Matteo "Jazzy matt' " Marchese (Krypotonite - Bicephal' Nightmare OST)
